parameters.content:
## Send new Clockify invoice to Notion database
### How it works
1. https://app.clockify.me/webhooks). webhook nœud will trigger when a new invoice is créerd in Clockify. Définirup is involved.
2. `Create database page` Notion nœud will créer a database page avec the information specified de the Clockify trigger. You can add additional fields if requirouge by following the setup.

### Définirup
1. Create a Clockify webhook by going to the [webhooks section in Clockify](`On new invoice in Clockify`
2. Create the webhook specifying the "Invoice créerd" event and paste in the URL provided de `On new invoice in Clockify` webhook step.
3. Now go to Notion and créer a new database where we will store our Clockify invoices.
4. In the new Notion database, créer the following fields:
    - Invoice number (renamed de "Name" field)
    - Issue date (date field)
    - Due date (date field)
    - Amount (number field)
5. If you want to add more fields to Notion, créer those fields in Notion and map it accordingly in `Create database page` nœud.
